text.autoconfig.mace-mod.title: MaceMod Configuration
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.Survival: The reach distance for attacks in Survival mode.
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.Creative: The reach distance for attacks in Creative mode.
The hotbar slot for the axe (-1 to disable).
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.maceSlot: The hotbar slot for the mace (-1 to disable).
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.FOV.@Too: The amount in degrees that the macro can see
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.FallDist: The minimum fall distance for mace attacks.
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.Cooldown: Toggle whether to respect the attack cooldown (0 = off, 1 = on).
text.autoconfig.mace-mod.option.Smoothin: Smoothing the movement of the camera by the mod.
